workflow.name: üì¶ AI-powered damage reporting tool for logistics with Gmail, Telegram and GPT
workflow.description:
*Tags: Logistics, Supply Chain, Warehouse Operations, Paperless processes, Quality Management*

### Context

Hi! I‚Äôm [Samir](https://samirsaci.com) ‚Äî Supply Chain Engineer, Data Scientist based in Paris, and founder of [LogiGreen](https://logi-green.com).

> Let us use n8n to help small companies digitalise their logistics and supply chain!

This workflow helps warehouse operators generate a complete damage report without needing to write anything manually.

[![Workflow Overview](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/size/w1000/2025/11/image-44.png)](https://youtu.be/3Xdo1pzd8rw)

In warehouse operations, damaged pallets must be reported quickly and consistently. 
 
You can automate the entire process using **AI to analyse photos of the damages**.

üì¨ For business inquiries, you can find me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samir-saci)

### Example of damage report

The process starts with instructions sent with the operator: 

[![Telegram Instructions](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/11/image-28.png)](https://youtu.be/3Xdo1pzd8rw)

A photo of the damaged pallets is shared with the bot:

![Damaged Pallet](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/11/image-30.png)

A complete report is generated and sent by email:

[![Email Screenshot](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/11/image-27.png)](https://youtu.be/3Xdo1pzd8rw)

### üé• Tutorial

A complete tutorial (with explanations of every node) is available on YouTube:

[![Tutorial + Demo](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/11/temp-14.png)](https://youtu.be/3Xdo1pzd8rw)

### Who is this template for?

This template is ideal for companies with limited IT ressources:

- **Warehouse operators** who need a fast reporting tool  
- **Quality teams** who want consistent and structured reports  
- **3PLs and logistics providers** looking to digitalise damage claims  
- **Manufacturers and retailers** with high inbound pallet volumes  
- **Anyone using Telegram** on the warehouse floor for quick interactions

### What does this workflow do?

This workflow acts as an **AI-powered damaged goods reporting assistant** using Telegram, OpenAI Vision and Gmail.

1. A operator sends a picture of the damaged pallet via **Telegram**.  
2. The workflow downloads the image and sends it to **GPT-4o** for damage analysis.  
3. The bot replies and asks for a **photo of the pallet barcode**.  
4. The barcode picture is processed by **GPT-4o Mini** to extract the pallet number.  
5. The workflow combines both results (damage analysis + pallet ID).  
6. It generates an **HTML email report** with: damage summary, observed issues, severity level and recommended actions   
7. The report is automatically sent via **Gmail** to the configured recipient.  
8. The operator receives a confirmation message in Telegram.

The processes does not require any data input form the operator, only to take pictures!


### Next Steps

Before running the workflow, follow the sticky notes and configure:

- Connect your **Telegram Bot API**  
- Add your **OpenAI API Key** in the AI nodes  
- Connect your **Gmail** credentials  
- Update the **recipient email** in the ‚ÄúSend Report by Email‚Äù node  

*Submitted: 20 November 2025*  
*Template designed with n8n version 1.116.2*

nodes.name: Reinitialise State Variables
nodes.notes: You only need to run the initialization step once per workflow, regardless of the number of Telegram chat IDs. The initialization creates the telegramStates object within the global static data of the workflow. Once that object exists, the workflow will use it to store the state for any chat ID.

parameters.text:
=ü§ñ *LogiGreen AI Damage Inspector*

üì∏ Step 1 ‚Äî Upload a clear picture of the damaged pallet  
This allows me to analyze the damage and generate a structured report.

üè∑Ô∏è Step 2 ‚Äî Send a photo of the pallet barcode  
This identifies the pallet and links it to your warehouse records.

üì§ Once both images are received, I will automatically create and send the full damage report.

=ü§ñ LogiGreen AI Damage Inspector  
üì∑ Please take a clear photo of the pallet barcode so I can identify the pallet.

=You are an AI assistant specialized in warehouse operations and damaged-goods reporting.
Analyze the image provided and output a clean, structured damage report.
Stay factual and describe only what you can see.

Your output MUST follow this exact structure:

Damage Summary:
- [1‚Äì2 sentence high-level description]

Observed Damage:
- Packaging condition: [...]
- Pallet condition: [...]
- Product condition: [...]
- Stability: [...]

Severity: [Minor / Moderate / Severe]

Recommended Actions:
- [...]
- [...]

Guidelines:
- Do NOT hallucinate information not visible in the image.
- If something is unclear, write: "Not visible".
- Severity must be one of: Minor, Moderate, Severe.
- Recommended actions should be short and actionable.
Read the barcode, just output the value, nothing else.

=‚úÖ Your damage report has been generated and sent successfully.   
ü§ñ *LogiGreen AI Damage Inspector*

parameters.content:
## AI Damage Report Generator for Warehouse Operations

This workflow is designed to help warehouse operators generate a complete damage report without needing to write anything manually.

### How it Works
1. **Telegram Trigger** receives the operator‚Äôs first image (damaged pallet)
2. The workflow runs **AI Damage Analysis (GPT-4o)** to generate a structured report.
3. The bot then asks the operator to **send a photo of the pallet barcode**.
4. **AI Barcode Reader (GPT-4o Mini)** extracts the pallet ID from it
5. Both results (damage report + pallet number) are stored temporarily.
6. The workflow generates an **HTML report**.
7. The report is emailed automatically to the quality team.

### Setup
- [ ] Connect your **Telegram Bot API** to receive images.
- [ ] Add your **OpenAI API Key** to the Vision nodes.
- [ ] Connect your **Gmail** credentials.
- [ ] Update the **recipient email address** in the ‚ÄúSend Report by Email‚Äù node. 

### Customize
- **Branding:** update logo, colors and bot name
- **Damage Analysis**: enrich the report generated by the AI node
## 1. Telegram Trigger and message format check
## 2. If the message is not an image, send instructions
## 3. Load state variables and check whether a report was already generated
## 5. Download the image, generate the report , store it, and request the barcode
## 4. Download the photo to extract the bar code
## 7. Generate the final report, send it by email, and confirm to the operator
## 6. Load the state variables used for the report

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
